body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Equip an Infiltration Lens to a creature (in my test, a Sphinx of Lost Truths)
2. Attack into a blocker (in my test, an Angelic Wall) What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The Lens should trigger once; instead it happens twice (drawing a total of four cards). What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.34, MacOS 10.8
author: [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/)
title: Infiltration Lens triggers twice upon blocking

comments.body:
Thanks for the report. The trigger was happening 1 + number of blockers times and it was not all triggering together but one after another. I simplified it and it works as expected now.

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
